title: EGA unveils aluminium recycling initiative amid sustainability push - The National
summary: Emirates Global Aluminium has initiated an aluminium recycling coalition in the UAE to promote recycling and support a greener economy, targeting a step-change in aluminium recycling with a focus on beverage cans. The coalition includes key industry players and aims to significantly increase the recycling rate in the UAE while contributing to a circular economy and decarbonisation efforts.
green_innovation: TRUE. This initiative contributes to environmental sustainability goals by promoting aluminium recycling, reducing waste, and supporting a circular economy.
business_innovation: TRUE. The launch of the aluminium recycling initiative represents a new business process focusing on sustainability and environmental responsibility.
green_product: TRUE. Aluminium recycling is a green product as it involves the sustainable use of materials, minimizes energy consumption and waste, and supports recycling practices.
green_process: TRUE. The aluminium recycling process aims to minimize environmental impacts, reduce waste, and promote sustainability by reusing materials and minimizing energy consumption.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 331313 - Alumina Refining and Primary Aluminum Production, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection
